chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
x: nat
ll: list nat

Goal:
nat_sorted (x :: ll) -> nat_sorted ll

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
nat_sorted = fun ll : list nat => forall (l : list nat) (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat), ll = l ++ a :: m ++ b :: r -> a < b : list nat -> Prop Arguments nat_sorted _%list_scope
in_nat_sorted_2 : forall (x y : nat) (ll : list nat), x < y -> nat_sorted (y :: ll) -> nat_sorted (x :: y :: ll)
in_nat_sorted_3 : forall (x : nat) (ll : list nat), Forall (lt x) ll -> nat_sorted ll -> nat_sorted (x :: ll)
in_nat_sorted_1 : forall x : nat, nat_sorted (x :: nil)
list_injective_inv : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (ll : list X), list_injective (x :: ll) -> ~ In x ll /\ list_injective ll
Forall_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x : X) (ll : list X), Forall P (x :: ll) < -> P x /\ Forall P ll
RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz : forall C : Type, nat -> list nat -> RingMicromega.Psatz C -> list nat
in_nat_sorted_0 = fun l : list nat => match l as l0 return (forall (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat), nil = l0 ++ a :: m ++ b :: r -> a < b) with | nil => fun (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat) (H : nil = nil ++ a :: m ++ b :: r) => let H0 : False := eq_ind nil (fun e : list nat => match e with | nil => True | _ :: _ => False end) I (nil ++ a :: m ++ b :: r) H in False_ind (a < b) H0 | n :: l0 => fun (a : nat) (m : list nat) (b : nat) (r : list nat) (H : nil = (n :: l0) ++ a :: m ++ b :: r) => let H0 : False := eq_ind nil (fun e : list nat => match...
Permutation.Permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
Permutation.Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
list_an = fix list_an (a n : nat) {struct n} : list nat := match n with | 0 => nil | S n0 => a :: list_an (S a) n0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments list_an (_ _)%nat_scope
seq = fix seq (start len : nat) {struct len} : list nat := match len with | 0 => nil | S len0 => start :: seq (S start) len0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments seq (_ _)%nat_scope
Permutation.Permutation_ind_bis : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l')) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l'
nat_new = fun l : list nat => S (lmax l) : list nat -> nat Arguments nat_new _%list_scope
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
list_sum = fun l : list nat => fold_right Init.Nat.add 0 l : list nat -> nat Arguments list_sum _%list_scope
list_max = fun l : list nat => fold_right Init.Nat.max 0 l : list nat -> nat Arguments list_max _%list_scope
RingMicromega.extract_hyps : forall C : Type, C -> list (RingMicromega.NFormula C) -> list nat -> list (RingMicromega.NFormula C)
lmax = fold_right Nat.max 0 : list nat -> nat Arguments lmax _%list_scope
lsum = fold_right Init.Nat.add 0 : list nat -> nat Arguments lsum _%list_scope
list_injective_rect : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Type), P nil -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), ~ In x l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_injective l -> P l
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
nth : forall A : Type, nat -> list A -> A -> A
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
RingMicromega.nhyps_of_psatz : forall C : Type, RingMicromega.Psatz C -> list nat
